duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparation of contracts, licensing agreements, and basic formation documents for new business entities.
Organization of corporate records and maintenance of entity registration.
Conducting legal research and analysis as well as research on current developments in small business and start-up law.
Trademark searching/preparation and various corporate legal work.
Collaborating with other attorneys and legal professionals.

education_certification.credential: J.D. degree from an ABA-accredited institution. Licensed attorney in good standing or willing to get a MN license. Minimum of three years of Business and Trademark experience within a law firm setting or comparable in-house setting.
